channel.title: Releaseds on Last Week in Google Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in Releaseds on Last Week in Google Cloud

item.title: 2021 Week 5 (2021-02-01-)
item.description: Cloud Run (fully managed) added Cloud Run now supports WebSockets, HTTP/2 and gRPC streaming. (January 20, 2021) Status: Preivew Docs Invoking with WebSockets Using HTTP/2 Using gRPC Posts Official: Introducing WebSockets, HTTP/2 and gRPC bidirectional streams for Cloud Run Secret Manager added Secret Manager Expiration is available for all customers via public preview.(January 28, 2021) Status: Preview Docs Official: Creating and Managing Expiring Secrets Cloud SQL added Query Insights is now generally available.

item.title: 2021 Week 6 (2021-02-08-)
item.description: BigQuery added Clustered tables now support the DATETIME type for clustering columns. For more information, see Creating and using clustered tables. This feature is generally available. (January 29, 2021) Status: GA Docs: Creating and using clustered tables Cloud Workflows added Preview: Connectors Status: Preivew Docs Creating and using clustered tables Connectors samples Network Connectivity Center added Launched in Preview Docs: Network Connectivity Posts ja: Network Connectivity Center Cloud Logging added GA: Cloud Logging increased write API call limit

item.title: 2021 Week 7 (2021-02-15-)
item.description: BigQuery changed BigQuery standard SQL queries on Google Cloud Storage data are now supported by cached query results. (February 12, 2021) Docs: Using cached query results Compute Engine added Google Virtual NIC (gVNIC) driver is now generally available. For more information, see Using Google Virtual NIC. (February 12, 2021) Status: GA Docs: Using Google Virtual NIC
